name: Dergerald 2
description:
Content warning: Vore

Furaffinity Page: https://www.furaffinity.net/view/49314682/

Music playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTpW9FOqDU5fQ7kuQB7WesKly437s_iF7

Dergerald 2 is a game where you play as one or two dragons defending a large gem at all costs! Defeat your enemies to gain energy, and spend it at 100% on a magic fire blast!

Controls: Left and Right to move, Down to attack, Up at 100% to fire a magic blast!

Player 1 (Sapphire) uses the Arrow keys and Player 2 (Quartz) uses the WASD keys

Escape pauses the game

Sapphire and Quartz fight against an entourage of slime monsters named Purins! There are six types.

  • Regular Purins have decent speed but don't do anything.
  • Hermit Purins have a sturdy shell that takes a single blow before falling off, they aggro when they aren't carrying that heavy shell!
  • Ghost Purins can't take any damage or hurt anyone until they go near the gem, keep an eye peeled for when they become solid!
  • Jawbreaker Purins are super fast and have a thick shell that takes all your swing to break through, don't get caught off guard!
  • Bandit Purins are faster than most and will steal you away once they catch you, press down rapidly to eat your way out of them!
  • And the dreaded Megapurins only show their face every 3 levels, don't underestimate their slowness, they become so much faster the more damage they take...
